EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.Bill Cook 12-11-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Town Hall Replay and Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team,
Thank you all for joining us at the Town Hall this past Thursday. Catch the replay here <[[https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/inside-pivotal/pivotal-town-hall?utm_source=iphome&utm_medium=slider&utm_campaign=townhall]]>, and please take a few moments to take the Town Hall survey <[[https://docs.google.com/a/pivotal.io/forms/d/1RZjdMCNjXZCTX-jC68yeZJGjL8Buc24esWQkchrrSR8/viewform]]>. Your feedback is valuable, and helps us improve these events.
Weâ€™re working hard to wrap up an outstanding year, and as I mentioned, we still have some big notes to hit before we close out 2015.
Thank you all for the commitment and hard work, and have a happy and peaceful holidays!
